PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-00452015-01-29,  ,  JUS,  , 
ActGarnishment, Attachment and Pension Diversion Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Garnishment and Attachment Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the GARNISHMENT AND ATTACHMENT REGULATIONS in order to (1) ensure the Regulations are accurate; (2) improve the garnishment process and take advantage of technological capacity; and (3) provide enhanced assistance to provinces and territories in their enforcement activities and support federal, provincial and territorial cooperation.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2015-0022 Publication Date: 2015-02-11
AttachmentsAttachment
